sentences.sContent: a beautiful campus in New England
sentences.sCn: 新英格兰的一个美丽校园

sentences.sContent: ...Check with your school’s career service or employment office for help to find a campus job...
...What can students do to find a campus job according to the speaker...
...one might think the college campus m a pretty equal place...
...will bring us an ever-lasting benefit to both our campus and our society...
...it is necessary to strengthen the ties between campus and society...

synos.tran: （大学）校园；大学，大学生活；校园内的草地

phrases.pCn: 校园活动；校内活动（campus activity的复数形式）

remMethod.val: camp(野营地) ＋ us(我们) → 校园是学生学习的营地 → 校园

trans.tranOther: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live
